subject: Soccer
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Charlie Davies, the forward for the United States national team who was injured in a car accident last week, has been moved out of intensive care and will have surgery next week to repair a broken left elbow.
snippet: Charlie Davies, the forward for the United States national team who was injured in a car accident last week, has been moved out of intensive care and will have surgery next week to repair a broken left elbow.
